blog.name: hailing-stars
blog.title: irondad - relax about it
blog.description: here's where I obsess over marvel / IRONDAD / oh and I write A03

tags: i cannot be the only one
summary: does anyone remember Charlie Bartlett??
body:
does anyone remember Charlie Bartlett??

Seriously guys, I feel like this entire movie is an irondad fanfic from before there was anyone irondad fanfic.

Basically an AU where RDJ is an alcoholic high school principal who gets into a power struggle with a teenager who thinks he’s psychiatrist but is actually just a drug dealer. 

In this AU Darcy from Thor is Tony Stark’s daughter.

In this AU Tony’s mother is actually Peter’s mother. Actually in this AU Peter and Tony have switched places almost completely because Peter’s the rich boy with father issues.

And there’s whump. 

Honestly though, without all the irondad comparisons, this movie is so good and everyone needs to watch it.

summary: Idk if just you give me this impression- but like, why is Stony so sexualized? They're both goofy dorks capable of lots of fluff
question: Idk if just you give me this impression- but like, why is Stony so sexualized? They're both goofy dorks capable of lots of fluff
answer:
My sexuality/ability to talk about sex was heavily repressed from being in a religious environment since birth so a lot of that repression comes out a lot through what I enjoy and talk about.

However….. my favorite stevetony trope is deaging, which is very much nonsexual and all fluff!!

If you want to see more fluff content come into my inbox and talk to me!!! They are VERY good soft boys and definitely have a lot of potential for good, G-rated fluff.

Peter finds a ring in Steve’s jacket pocket.

Peter contemplates how long his dad is going to ground him when he finds out what he’s just done.

summary: Does anyone know the layout of inside the Avengers Compound? I have trouble writing scenes in general if I don’t have an idea of...
body: Does anyone know the layout of inside the Avengers Compound? I have trouble writing scenes in general if I don’t have an idea of the layout of the house/building/city etc, so it’s really hard to write anything that takes place inside of the Avengers Compound because I don’t know what the layout is. So if anyone knows what the layout is, can you please send it to me because it’s really difficult to write everything. I’m really close to giving up and drawing my own layout of part of the compound, because I need something to base my writing off of. I found these, but I don’t think they’re accurate:

I have trouble writing scenes in general if I don’t have an idea of the layout of the house/building/city etc, so it’s really hard to write anything that takes place inside of the Avengers Compound because I don’t know what the layout is. So if anyone knows what the layout is, can you please send it to me because it’s really difficult to write everything. I’m really close to giving up and drawing my own layout of part of the compound, because I need something to base my writing off of. I found these, but I don’t think they’re accurate:

blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Beauty
title: Beauty
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2WxdZPt

by egosoffire

Tony Stark is beautiful. That seems like such a simplistic thing to say, but there is nothing simple about his beauty. Stephen watches him and the yearning in his heart burns. He is so weak, and so ravenous. Tony’s features are chiseled, evidence of suffering and strength. Stephen wants to touch him more than he wants anything else.

(The one where Stephen’s an incubus and in love with Tony.)

blog.name: anthxnystarks
blog.title: i am iron man

tags: but the fact that its 35 armors again makes me wonder
if he keeps up the 8 armors in 6 years pace 26 years
that would be so out tho so yeah i can guess another six months whether from iw or from when he gets back to earth
summary:
the lovely Mark 85 hot toy figurine for endgame!!
...Mark 85? Tony was using Mark 50 in Infinity War. The last time Tony mass...
body:
the lovely Mark 85 hot toy figurine for endgame!!

…Mark 85? Tony was using Mark 50 in Infinity War. The last time Tony mass produced armors was during the six months between the Battle of New York (Mark 7) and the Extremis mess in IM3 (Mark 42). He made 35 new armors in that time span that became the Iron Legion but since then he’s only made 8 new armors. Anyway from 50 to 85 is, again, 35 new armors so either Iron Legion is coming back, there’s at least six months between Infinity War and when this armor is used (which gives us a good time frame of when Endgame is set), and/or Tony is falling back on his armor obsession coping mechanism to deal with the PTSD fallout of the Decimation.

Also wanna say Mark 85 looks a lot like his classic 60-70’s armor look :’)
